Name: Pelikan Sh.p.k(Durres, Head Office)
Profile:
Pelikan Ltd was established on 1991, with scope of activities Logistics Services, forwarding, Shipping Agencies, Domestic and International Transport, warehousing, customs assistance etc.

Since then, the company has been aiming at providing a complete service of full logistic chain with the highest possible quality for various import and export activities for its customers.

From the beginning Pelikan is the main shipping and forwarding agent of Durres Port (Main port of Albania) and has been a reference point for all foreign investors performing activities in our country, by assisting their
projects.

Today the company Head Quartered in Durres employs more than 150 People.
Currently the Agency is ranked "Top Logistics" provider in Albania and also in the Balkan region.

Pelikan is Number 1 in Albania for container logistics operations with its 120.000 m2 dry port, Container terminal.

Pelikan also offers best facilities in the country to handle Chrome Ore Shipments with full logistic chain.
Address: Egnatia Str, Fly Tower, 13th floor,2001, Durres, Albania

Name: International Trans 06(Tirana, Head Office)
Profile:
International Trans 06 was founded in 2007 with 100% Albanian capital by owner Mr. Spartak Lamaj. The main activity of the company is the national and international transport of goods via land, sea and air. The headquarters of the company is in Tirana, the capital of Albania while the main activity is concentrated at the port of Durrës, where most of the cargo comes through.

Based on the contracts and partnership with international companies in the field of freight forwarding, we offer global transport services to and from Albania and neighboring countries.

Our primary objective is to serve to clients very efficiently and in the best ways possible.
The objective of being a leader in the Albanian market in matters of quality, correctness and professionalism has been the vision of our company for more than 10 years.

We guarantee quality and maximum dedication towards our clients and partners, a guaranty which is backed by the numerous certificates we have received in recognition of our work and the support we count on being part of some of the world’s biggest international transport networks.

What we offer:
International transportation of goods by land with trucks, sea by container and air via cargo, services which we offer with quality and professionalism.

We offer land transport services of goods from all over Europe with truck or partial load cargo with destination Albania and Kosovo.

By sea transport we can get the best tariffs and the quality of service for our clients whether they are full cargo FCL or partial one, LCL.

Air transport can lower logistics cost and offer faster service for those goods that are urgent. Through global contracts with cargo airlines, we offer transport services via air for clients from around the world to Albania and vice versa.

Our specialized staff follows every step of the transport procedures with dedication from taking control of cargo until the final destination.

Name: SKY NET  Logistic Sh.P.K.(Tirana, Head Office)
Profile:
SKY NET Logistic Sh.P.K. is an Albanian full-service forwarding company headquartered in Tirana. We have offices in Tirana Customs, Rinas Airport, and Port of Durres, and also have network offices in the major cities of Albania for courier shipments.

SKY NET Logistic Sh.P.K. follows three company values:
The requirement for personal engagement, a competitive mindset as well as living partnership are the main foundations of our service offerings. Every single employee of our company shares the same values and is ready to help you no matter what happens.
Address: Terminal Center, Kati 4,Autostrada Tirane-Durres Km. 0,1050 Tirana, Albania

Name: Aster Logistics Balkans Shpk(Durres)
Profile:
Aster Logistics Balkans is a young and aggressive Freight Forwarder and Global Logistics Provider formed by a group of professional logistics / transportation / custom broker executives with over 20 years of experience. Strategically located next to the port of Durres, the gateway for all Balkans and just 30 minutes’ drive to Tirana International Airport (TIA), we offer wide array of services including domestic warehousing and fully custom bonded warehouse. We specialize in freight-forwarding by Air, Sea and Land as well as related services such as distribution, custom brokerage, haulages, project and heavy lifts and global logistics management.

10 professional people working together as a group for quality & commitments.

Name: Blackthorne Sh.p.k(Tirana)
Profile:
You engage Blackthorne's world class supply chain team to provide a door-to-door logistics service.
  
Key services we routinely provide customers like you:
•       A one stop overseas representation and logistics company with a fanatical attention to detail on all matters of compliance
•       Importer of Record (IOR) and Exporter of Record (EOR) - award winning customs clearance
•       Legal Entity representation for clients in 226 countries around the world
•       Export Licensing - we are conversant with all the latest legislation and definitions
•       Data Centre deliveries – legal entity and compliance specialists in these environments
Address: Njesia Bashkiake Nr.2,Rruga Themistokli Germenji,Pallati Pegaso, Kati 7, Ap 30,Tirana 1001, Albania

Name: Interliner Agencies d.o.o.(Tirana)
Profile:
InterlinerAgencies d.o.o. is a full service logistics company and one of the leading companies in the Adriatic area with offices covering a large section of Central East Europe. 

Interliner Agencies is present at the following locations:
* Slovenia: port of Koper, and capital city Ljubljana
* Austria: capital city of Vienna
* Hungary: capital city of Budapest
* Czech Republic: capital city of Prague
* Croatia: ports of Rijeka, and in the capital city Zagreb
* Serbia: capital city of Belgrade
* Macedonia: capital city of Skopje
* Bosnia & Hercegovina: capital city of Sarajevo
* Albania: capital city of Tirana

Our activities in all locations:
* All activities related to sea freight and port agency
* All activities related to road and rail haulage, airfreight
* Forwarding, customs clearance and warehousing

Koper, Slovenia is the main office of the Interliner Agencies Network, and Interliner Agencies Croatia has been a WCA member since early year 2005.

Name: Milsped Albania SHPK(Tirana)
Profile:
The Milsped Group, a market leader in the Balkan region of transportation and logistics, has for the past 25 years successfully been conducting business. Milsped Albania is situated in Tirana and currently has 60 employees. 

Milsped Albania can offer complete logistics services: road transport (FTL and LTL), customs clearance, warehousing and distribution, air, ocean freight (FCL and LCL) and rail freight. We can offer all port services in Durres port and all services in airfreight transport. We handle with 4,500 m2 warehouse in Tirana. From our warehouse we have daily delivery during whole Tirana with our fleet and subcontractor’s fleet. Milsped Albania have own fleet of trucks and contracts with a huge number trucking companies and we offer to our client’s reliable service with a competitive price.
Address: Autostrada Tirane-Durres,Km 5 Rruga Gryka e Kacanikut,Godina e Parkut Logjistik,Tirana, Albania

Name: SBA Albania Sh.p.k.(Tirana)
Profile:
SBA Group is an international freight forwarder and logistics provider that is operating in the Balkan Peninsula. We began our operations in 2007. The excellent geographical position of our offices will allow us to represent a market of more than 50 million people, offering one shop solutions in terms of accounting, operations and communication, by covering various developing countries under our brand name.

Our group, apart from the general freight forwarding, has targeted to niche markets and special commodities. Today SBA is successfully handling the following niche commodities:

- Foodstuff/Dry & Reefer
- Pharmaceuticals/Biological Specimens
- Express/Time Critical shipments
- ATA Carnets/Temporary Imports

Our goal is to become a reliable and innovative partner by offering efficient and on time solutions to the industry and by establishing new services to our market.
Address: Rr."Vangjush Furxhi", Nd.6, H.4, Ap.1 Njesia Bashkiake Nr.10, 1001, Tirana, Albania

Name: World Transport Overseas Albania SHPK(Tirana)
Profile:
World Transport Overseas Bulgaria Ltd (WTO) is one of the fastest growing freight forwarding companies in the Balkans region with own offices in Bulgaria (Sofia, Varna, Burgas and Plovdiv), Serbia (Belgrade), Slovenia (Koper), Croatia (Zagreb) and Shanghai (China). World Transport Overseas Bulgaria was founded in 2001 in Sofia, where the HQ of World Transport Overseas Group is still based. 

The company is one of the largest FCL freight forwarders in Bulgaria, having global contracts with major shipping lines to/from ports of Varna, Burgas, Thessaloniki and Constanta and able to handle various logistics landside operations including project cargo. 

World Transport Overseas is the market leader for LCL consolidations in Bulgaria, operating:
• Direct LCL consols from main ports in the Far East and Middle East to Varna port and Sofia CFS (via Thessaloniki). At present, 14 direct weekly services to Bulgaria are available;
• Export LCL consols from Varna CFS to the Far East (via Hong Kong), Middle East/E. Africa/N. Africa (via Dubai) and Israel;
• LCL service to/from rest of the world with co-loaders in N. Europe.
  
We offer fast and professional replies to enquiries, flexible rebate policy, seamless handling of DDU/DDP shipments, strong in-house Customs brokerage department, low pricing for inland haulage of containers, unloading at port/warehouse. 

Our Air Freight division, which is located in the Sofia airport area offers very competitive air freight rates and handles DDU/ DDP enquiries with ease. We are operating our own warehouse in the Sofia airport and arranging door deliveries by means of our own vehicles. 

World Transport Overseas BG is certified with ISO 9001:2015 and is a licensed IATA Cargo Agent.
